definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Sino-French War (1883-1885) (concerning French seizure of Vietnam)
treaty of Tianjin of 1885 ceding Vietnam to France

sentences.english: At present, the China-France relations have staged a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 當前，中法關係呈現良好發展勢頭。

sentences.english: I intend to return home after the Sino-French joint venture management to do the work.
sentences.chinese: 我打算回國後在中法合資企業做經營管理方面的工作。

sentences.english: At present, China-France relations enjoy sound development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 當前，中法關係發展勢頭良好。

sentences.english: "China appreciates France's latest move and feels happy about the restoration of bilateral relations," Hu said.
sentences.chinese: 中方對此表示讚賞，並對中法關係得以恢復感到高興。

sentences.english: In the Majiang Battle between China and France, Chinese Fujian Sea Fleet was almost annihilated.
sentences.chinese: 在中法馬江之戰中，中國的福建艦隊幾乎全軍覆沒。

sentences.english: This year is pivotal to China-France relations.
sentences.chinese: 今年是中法關係繼往開來的一年。

sentences.english: China-France relations should continue to play a demonstration role.
sentences.chinese: 中法關係應當繼續發揮示範作用。

sentences.english: Sino-French relations should continue to play an exemplary role.
sentences.chinese: 中法關係應當繼續發揮示範作用。

sentences.english: At present, China-France relations enjoy a sound development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 當前中法關係呈現良好的發展勢頭。

sentences.english: He expressed hope that both sides continue working hard to push forward bilateral relations constantly.
sentences.chinese: 希望雙方繼續努力，推動中法關係不斷向前發展。

sentences.english: Further development of China-France relations is in the common interest of the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 進一步發展中法關係符合中法人民的共同利益。

sentences.english: Can you tell us what is the current situation of China-France relations?
sentences.chinese: 你如何評價中法關係的現狀？

sentences.english: This year, the bilateral relations face significant development opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 今年，中法關係面臨重要發展機遇。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to attend the Seminar on China-France Relationship and meet both old and new friends here.
sentences.chinese: 很高興參加中法關係研討會，並與新老朋友見面。

sentences.english: Not long ago, the China-France relationship encountered with severe difficulties because of Tibet-related issues.
sentences.chinese: 前一段時間，中法關係因涉藏問題遭遇嚴重困難。

definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
Three Kingdoms period (220-280) in Chinese history/several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from 1st century AD to unification under Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2] in 658
